pages.text: $(li)The Blindsight Tongue is an item that can be used to craft a $(l)Fungus & Tongue Stew$() and the $(l:patchouli:weapons/blindsight_tongue_whip)Blindsight Tongue Whip$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/blindsight)Blindsights$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
